articles.title: SC quashes prosecution, confiscation of Benami transactions from 1988 to 2016
articles.description: A three-judge bench headed by Chief Justice of India (CJI) NV Ramana held that the 1988 law was “still born” and “unconstitutional” and the 2016 amended law will apply only prospectively, and not retrospectively.
